text: Alexander William Welsh (October 12, 1907 – January 4, 1971) was a Canadian curler. He was a member of 1947 Brier Champion team (skipped by his younger brother Jimmy Welsh), playing as third, representing Manitoba. A member of the Deer Lodge Curling Club in Winnipeg, Manitoba, he was also a three-time provincial champion."Champion Curler Alex Welsh Dies At Age 63", Winnipeg Free Press, Tuesday, January 05, 1971, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada, pg. 19 ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Brier champions Category:Canadian male curlers Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Scottish emigrants to Canada Category:Curlers from Edinburgh Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg
title: Alex Welsh (curler)
